explains: n. 诱骗；快速扭转，缠绕
v. 使弯曲；（使）弯曲变形；转动（身体部位）；（猛地将身体）扭动；曲折（twist 的现在分词）
wordGroup: twisting machine 捻线机；捻丝机
twisting test 扭转试验；扭曲试验；扭力试验
twisting force 扭力，扭转力；圆周力，切向力

sentences.en: A snake was twisting around his arm.
sentences.cn: 一条蛇缠绕在他的手臂上。

sentences.en: The majority of three-dimensional representations, whether standing, seated, or kneeling, exhibit what is called frontality: they face straight ahead, neither twisting nor turning.
sentences.cn: 大多数的三维雕像，无论是站立的、坐着的还是跪着的，都表现出一种被称为“正面描绘”的特征：它们面向正前方，既不扭曲也不旋转。

sentences.en: The newspaper was accused of twisting the facts.
sentences.cn: 这家报纸被指责歪曲事实。
